p: According to Gupta [ 55], EOs from aerial parts presented ( Z)-tagetone (31.0%), ( Z)-β-οcimene (15.4%), ( E)-tagetenone (15.4%), ( Z)-tagetenone (14.5%), ( E)-tagetone (10.3%), and dihydrotagetone (6.5%) as the main components, in addition to ( E)-β-ocimene, limonene, isomenthone, spathulenol, ( Z)-anethole, and ( E)-anethole. An EO from leaves produced in Argentina [ 99, 100] showed a similar composition, with ( E)-β-ocimene (27.3%), ( Z)- and ( E)-tagetone (26.0%), ( Z)- and ( E)-tagetenone (17.5%), and dihydrotagetone (16.8%).
